Article Title: ‘AQI, AQI’ chants erupt as Lionel Messi welcomed in Delhi, crowd targets CM Rekha Gupta - Watch
Article Text:
Delhi Chief Minister Rekha Gupta shakes hands with footballer Lionel Messi (ANI Photo/Naveen Sharma)

Delhi’s worsening air quality cast a shadow over Lionel Messi ’s farewell appearance in India, as a section of the crowd at the Arun Jaitley Stadium voiced its anger at the political leadership even while welcoming the global football icon.As Chief Minister Rekha Gupta stepped onto the stage on Monday to receive Messi during the final leg of the GOAT India Tour, chants of “AQI, AQI” rang out from parts of the stands. The reaction came amid hazardous pollution levels in the national capital, with the Air Quality Index touching 498 in the morning before easing slightly to 427 by evening, remaining in the ‘severe’ category for the third consecutive day. Visibility across the city dropped sharply, with a thick haze obscuring the skyline.The chants contrasted sharply with the celebratory atmosphere inside the stadium, where nearly 25,000 fans had gathered to catch a glimpse of Messi. The Delhi leg marked the conclusion of a tour that had begun chaotically in Kolkata but ended on a more organised note in the capital. Spectators packed the stands, many wearing Argentina’s blue and white jersey with the iconic No. 10, while celebrities and dignitaries watched from inside the ground.Messi, speaking briefly in Spanish, thanked the crowd for the affection shown throughout his India visit. He described the experience as intense but unforgettable, saying the love he received exceeded expectations and promising that he would return to India someday, possibly to play a match.After arriving at the stadium, Messi walked around the field smiling, watched the 7x7 celebrity match conclude, and waved repeatedly to the crowd. Alongside Inter Miami teammates Luis Suarez and Rodrigo De Paul, he kicked footballs into the stands during a lap of honour and later felicitated the Minerva Academy football team. The reception was notably freer than in Kolkata, where heavy security and political entourages had limited fan interaction.The tightly scripted 30-minute programme revolved largely around Messi. He was joined on stage by Rekha Gupta, ICC chairman Jay Shah , DDCA president Rohan Jaitley and former India football captain Bhaichung Bhutia towards the end of the event.While Messi mania dominated the evening, the chants inside the stadium underlined a growing public frustration over Delhi’s air crisis, turning a celebratory sporting moment into a pointed reminder of the capital’s ongoing environmental emergency.
Article Summary: Delhi chief minister rekha gupta welcomed lionel messi to the arun jaitley stadium on monday. But a section of the crowd at the stadium voiced its anger at the political leadership even while welcoming the global football icon. The reaction came amid hazardous pollution levels in the national capital.

Article Title: Could Blake Lively make a surprise appearance with Travis Kelce in Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour documentary? Fan speculation heats up
Article Text:
Fans eagerly await potential unseen footage of Blake Lively in Taylor Swift's Eras Tour documentary. Their enduring, private friendship holds deep emotional weight for viewers, who see a possible cameo as a personal affirmation of loyalty and continuity amidst Swift's monumental tour. The documentary's blend of performance and personal storytelling fuels this anticipation.

Why Blake Lively’s possible cameo carries emotional weight for fans

For years, Taylor Swift and Blake Lively have represented one of pop culture’s most enduring celebrity friendships, blending music, film, family, and quiet loyalty away from the spotlight. As Swift’s Eras Tour documentary continues to roll out on Disney+, fans are once again analyzing every frame for personal moments that reveal life behind the stadium lights.With additional episodes set to arrive later this month, online speculation has intensified around whether Lively might appear in unseen footage. The curiosity isn’t just about a cameo, it reflects a deeper fascination with how Swift’s inner circle fits into one of the most ambitious tours in modern music history. For longtime fans, even a brief glimpse could feel meaningful.The Eras Tour documentary is not just a concert film, it functions as a time capsule of Swift’s creative process, personal resilience, and trusted relationships during a career-defining moment. While the project already features collaborators, dancers, and close friends, Lively’s absence so far has stood out to fans who have followed the duo’s friendship for over a decade.Their bond has often unfolded quietly, through shared milestones rather than constant public appearances. That low-profile dynamic has only fueled curiosity, especially since Lively has remained largely out of the public eye in recent months amid a widely discussed legal dispute connected to a past film project.As a result, some fans see a potential documentary appearance as symbolic, not promotional, but personal.What also adds intrigue is timing. The remaining episodes are expected to spotlight more candid moments from Swift’s tour life, including downtime, private celebrations, and emotional checkpoints behind the scenes. If Lively does appear, it would likely be organic rather than staged, reinforcing the authenticity Swift has emphasized throughout the project.Beyond speculation, the conversation highlights something larger: the Eras Tour documentary has blurred the line between performance and personal storytelling. Fans aren’t only watching for vocals and choreography, they’re searching for quiet confirmations of loyalty, healing, and continuity amid massive success.Whether Lively ultimately appears or not, the attention underscores how invested audiences remain in Swift’s personal narrative. A brief moment, a background shot, or even an off-camera mention would be enough to spark discussion. For now, viewers are watching closely, convinced that if the friendship does surface, it will do so naturally, just like it always has.Also Read: Taylor Swift’s Eras Tour has a hidden Joe Alwyn connection amid her engagement to Travis Kelce
Article Summary: Fans eagerly await potential unseen footage of blake lively in taylor swift's eras tour documentary. Their enduring, private friendship holds deep emotional weight for viewers, who see a possible cameo as a personal affirmation of loyalty and continuity. The documentary's blend of performance and personal storytelling fuels this anticipation.

Article Title: “He wasn’t for me”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for the NBA legend
Article Text:
Ayesha Curry opens up about the first time she met Stephen Curry.(Image via Getty Images)

Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, speaks about the first time she saw the NBA legend



Stephen Curry confesses about the moment he decided to marry Ayesha Curry



Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry met each other long before he was drafted in the NBA and became one of the most popular and talented athletes in the world.While Stephen Curry’s marriage with Ayesha Curry has raised eyebrows over the years, she had confessed how she never thought the NBA legend will fall in love with her.A few years ago, in December 2020, Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, opened up to PEOPLE about meeting the Golden State Warriors’ star player for the first time when they were kids.Stephen Curry’s wife, Ayesha Curry, said, “We were just kids….”The popular entrepreneur and chef added, “He was the cute boy at church that all of the girls were obsessed with, so I made a generalization that maybe he wasn’t for me.”To this, Stephen Curry added, “I don’t remember the exact first day I saw her…”The Golden State Warriors’ star player continued, “There was no wind blowing in her face with a backlight.”While the two did meet when they were children because they were part of the same church, Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry did not start dating until years later, when they became teenagers.After dating for a couple of years, Stephen Curry and Ayesha Curry got married in 2011 and went on to create a beautiful family with four children.Even though their marriage has attracted a lot of criticism over the years, Stephen Curry has always credited his wife in public.A few days ago, as Stephen Curry promoted his new memoir Shot Ready, he spoke to PEOPLE about the moment he realised Ayesha Curry was the one for him.Stephen Curry said, “We had just started dating, or about a year and some change in, and I was deciding whether I was gonna go to the draft or not…”The Golden State Warriors’ star player added, “She actually told me to stay in school because of how important finishing my degree was and the whole deal…”Stephen Curry continued, “That conversation and the emotions that I got to share really just established the fact that she was gonna be my biggest supporter no matter what I did…”Also Read: “I've wanted to punch them”: Stephen Curry’s wife Ayesha Curry opens up about the anger she feels when women try to pursue the NBA legend
Article Summary: Ayesha curry opens up about the first time she met stephen curry. The two did meet when they were children because they were part of the same church. They started dating years later, when they became teenagers. After dating for a couple of years, the two got married in 2011.

Article Title: Davante Adams injury update: Insider breaks silence with a devastating update on the WR’s injury as the Rams gear up to face the Seahawks
Article Text:
Davante Adams sustained a brutal hamstring injury.(Image via Getty Images)

Insider shares a pretty concerning update on Davante Adams as the Los Angeles Rams gear up to face the Seattle Seahawks



What happened to Davante Adams at the match against the Detroit Lions



Davante Adams, the Los Angeles Rams’ star player, sustained a brutal hamstring injury in Week 15 when the team faced the Detroit Lions.As the Los Angeles Rams gear up to face the Seattle Seahawks on Thursday night, many remain concerned about Davante Adams’ health. Now, popular NFL insider NFL Network’s Ian Rapoport has opened up about him.A few hours ago, popular insider NFL Network's Ian Rapoport shared a pretty concerning update on the Los Angeles Rams’ star player.NFL Network's Ian Rapoport reported, "With any injury, but certainly a hamstring injury, hard to imagine he is out there Thursday night against Seattle…”The popular NFL insider, Ian Rapoport, added, "There are only a couple types of injuries this time of year: there's an injury where a guy is fine, there's an injury where he's back for the playoffs, and then he's done…”Ian Rapoport continued, “The hope is that this is one of those he's back for the playoffs."However, neither the team, the Los Angeles Rams, nor Davante Adams has confirmed the speculations about his return to the field.For the unversed, Davante Adams looked visibly in pain as he injured his hamstring at the match against the Detroit Lions.The popular Los Angeles Rams’ player was spotted limping on the sidelines before he walked away from the field with some assistance.After the match, the team’s head coach, Sean McVay, opened up about Davante Adams and said, “He was optimistic talking to him. He knows his body really well. They had an east and west double. He split it and then just came up where he felt it…”The popular head coach added, “We'll see what that means. I can't imagine that's good for Thursday with just a short amount of time, but I certainly wouldn't rule him out quite yet, but it didn't look good.”The Los Angeles Rams have recorded a pretty strong performance this season and has only lost once in the last five matches, as the team won against the Seattle Seahawks, the Arizona Cardinals, the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and the Detroit Lions.Also Read: “You lost me”: Joe Burrow’s rumored girlfriend Olivia Ponton opens up about her personal life amid the star player’s controversial statement
Article Summary: Davante adams, the los angeles rams’ star player, sustained a brutal hamstring injury in week 15 when the team faced the detroit lions. Now, popular nfl insider nfl network’s ian rapoport has opened up about him. The hope is that this is one of those he's back for the playoffs.

Article Title: Venus Williams and Andrea Preti combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, career, family, business income, and more
Article Text:
Venus Williams and Andrea Preti combined net worth in 2025: Tennis legend, career, family, business, and more (Image via Getty)

Venus Williams net worth and tennis career

Venus Williams recent update and future plans

Andrea Preti net worth and professional life



Venus Williams and Andrea Preti combined net worth in 2025

Venus Williams and Andrea Preti combined net worth in 2025 has caught the attention of fans around the world. Venus is one of the biggest names in tennis history, while Andrea Preti has built a quiet career in films and business. Their relationship has stayed mostly private, but their separate careers and financial success stories are very different and highly interesting.Venus Williams has an estimated net worth of $95 million in 2025, according to Celebrity Net Worth. Most of her money comes from her long tennis career. Venus has won seven Grand Slam singles titles and 14 Grand Slam doubles titles, many of them with her sister Serena Williams. She also earned millions from prize money during her years on tour.Beyond tennis, Venus Williams is a strong businesswoman. She owns the fashion brand EleVen by Venus Williams and runs V Starr, an interior design and building company. These businesses still bring in money even when she is not playing. Venus also played a big role in pushing for equal prize money for women in tennis, which changed the sport forever.In recent years, Venus Williams has focused more on recovery, fitness, and business.She has not officially retired from tennis. In interviews, she has said she listens to her body before making major comeback decisions.In 2024 and early 2025, Venus Williams stayed active in public events, brand work, and tennis-related projects. There has been no official announcement about a full-time return or retirement, keeping fans guessing about what comes next.Andrea Preti’s net worth in 2025 is estimated between $1 million and $2 million, based on film credits and media profiles. His exact earnings are not public. Andrea is a Danish-Italian actor, producer, and former model. He has worked on films like One More Day and Temptation.Andrea Preti also has a background in law and business. He has worked in corporate roles in Europe, which majorly adds to his income. While his net worth is much smaller than Venus’s, he has built it steadily through different fields rather than one single career.Together, Venus Williams and Andrea Preti have a combined net worth of around $96–97 million in 2025. Venus Williams' tennis legacy and business success make up most of that number.Andrea Preti adds support through his work in film and professional services. As a couple, they keep their life low-key, focused on careers, personal growth, and long-term goals.Also Read: Serena Williams And Venus Williams Combined Net Worth In 2025: Tennis Sisters, Earnings, Endorsements, Business, Career And More
Article Summary: Venus williams has an estimated net worth of $95 million in 2025, according to celebrity net worth. Most of her money comes from her long tennis career. Andrea preti’s net worth in 2025 is estimated between $1 million and $2 million, based on film credits and media profiles.

Article Title: “I’m gonna miss him” – Dwyane Wade gets emotional in heartfelt tribute as LeBron James’ historic NBA career draws praise
Article Text:
Dwyane Wade & LeBron James. Image via: Imagn Images

Dwyane Wade reflects on LeBron James in Year 23





Dwyane Wade and LeBron James memories from the Heat era





The bond between Dwyane Wade and LeBron James has always been special. As James steps into Year 23, Wade no longer speaks as a former teammate alone. He speaks as a fan who understands what the league is slowly preparing to lose. Recently, Wade commented on James’ 23rd NBA season comes contemplating who shared championships, pressure, and history with James at the highest level.Wade’s words arrive at a time when every appearance by LeBron feels meaningful. The milestones keep coming, yet the uncertainty lingers. For Wade, that reality has shifted how he watches the game now. There is admiration, reflection, and a sense of time closing in on an era few believed possible.Speaking candidly, Dwyane Wade did not hide the emotion tied to watching James still perform at an elite level. His appreciation felt personal and honest.“I’m like you guys, I’m a fan. I know it’s like, ‘he’s old, he should retire’. But at the same time, I’m gonna miss him… He’s just taking these moments in, we don’t know when the last one is coming.”Wade’s praise for James is not a one time thing. Previously, in episode of Wy Network by Dwyane Wade, the Heat legend shared his candid thoughts.“I have the greatest body of work of anybody that’s ever put a Miami Heat jersey on,” Wade said.“If you wanna be honest, LeBron James is the greatest player to ever put a Miami Heat jersey on… I’m the greatest player in the history of the Miami Heat for the body of work I had wearing that jersey, but I’m not the greatest player to ever put on a Miami Heat jersey.”Dwyane Wade retired from the NBA in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the Miami Heat. He admitted his burst was fading and the joy was gone, even as a Hall of Famer. Since retiring, Wade thrives as a businessman, media voice, and NBA owner, while proudly supporting his daughter Zaya.Wade recently revisited another iconic chapter with humor while recalling the famous Big Three introduction. His memory of that moment revealed both restraint and foresight.“Let’s run that tape who was it again. It’s one voice and look at the one in the middle laughing like young boy over here was talking… he was feeling the moment… look I look put my head down, look I put my head down, ‘I’m like hey man look now I’mma supportive teammate.'”“I’m my rubbing my knee I’m like ‘Oh I don’t know if I got that much… He trippin’, look I ain’t said a word… That was that supposed to have been a moment that was just for our fans and it should not have been the world should not have seen.”“That’s something that you say internal, you know what I mean? We going to win every year but really you know how hard it is to win one year. I don’t care what kind of talent you have so that’s why I was sitting there like oh my man don’t know yet.”“But he did go to the Finals 10 years in a row though. He damn sure didn’t like about how many opportunities. He almost did it, he ain’t lie… Listen, we went 4, he went 10.”In September this year, the 2025 Basketball Hall of Fame weekend carried special meaning for LeBron James and Dwyane Wade. While Wade was inducted in 2023 and James awaits retirement, both attended to honor the 2008 Team USA “Redeem Team.” The group’s induction marked a defining chapter in USA Basketball history. James and Wade shared a light moment before the ceremony, reflecting their long bond. The duo helped lead Team USA to Olympic gold in Beijing after the 2004 setback. That victory sparked a dominant run, with five straight Olympic gold medals since 2008.LeBron James is not stopping despite recent injury setbacks. The King got back on his feet and made a strong comeback. So far, he has not shared any update on his retirement.Also Read: "The Kings are here": LeBron James & Jay-Z's courtside moment sends NBA fans into meltdown
Article Summary: Dwyane wade retired from the nba in 2019 after 16 seasons, mostly with the miami heat. He admitted his burst was fading and the joy was gone, even as a hall of famer. Since retiring, wade thrives as a businessman, media voice, and nba owner, while proudly supporting his daughter zaya.

Article Title: Who is Mallika Sagar? Meet the woman set to conduct the IPL 2026 auction
Article Text:
Mallika Sagar (X)

IPL mini auction: Lot of interest for Cam Green | Wait ends for Prithvi Shaw, Sarfaraz Khan?

Mallika Sagar will be a familiar and significant presence when the IPL 2026 auction unfolds on Tuesday, December 16. For many fans, her presence in the room has become part of the modern IPL auction experience. Yet behind that composed exterior lies a journey that is both unusual and groundbreaking.Born in Mumbai in 1975, Sagar has built a rare career that bridges two traditionally exclusive worlds — fine art and elite sports auctions. Raised in a business-minded household, her fascination with auctioneering began unexpectedly, sparked by a book that featured a woman auctioneer as its protagonist. That early inspiration eventually set her on a path few in India had walked before.Sagar’s academic journey took her from Mumbai to Connecticut, before she graduated with a degree in Art History from Bryn Mawr College in Philadelphia. In 2001, she began her professional career at Sotheby’s London, developing deep expertise in Indian and South Asian art. Her rise was swift and historic. At the age of 26, she became Christie’s first Indian woman auctioneer in New York, specialising in modern and contemporary Indian art — a landmark achievement that established her credibility on the global auction circuit.After gaining years of international experience, Sagar returned to Mumbai and worked closely with renowned institutions such as Pundole’s Art Gallery. Her success in the art world laid the groundwork for a seamless transition into sports auctions, where her clarity, precision and authority quickly stood out.The turning point came in 2021 when she was appointed the first female auctioneer in the Pro Kabaddi League , breaking another long-standing barrier in a male-dominated space. Two years later, she was entrusted with conducting the inaugural Women’s Premier League auction, further cementing her growing influence in Indian sport.She subsequently conducted the IPL 2024 mini-auction and the high-profile IPL 2025 mega auction held in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.In 2025, Sagar added yet another milestone by leading the WPL 2026 auction, reinforcing her status as one of the most trusted and accomplished auctioneers in the sport.
Article Summary: Mallika sagar will be a familiar and significant presence when the ipl 2026 auction unfolds on tuesday, december 16. For many fans, her presence in the room has become part of the modern ipl auction experience. Yet behind that composed exterior lies a journey that is both unusual and groundbreaking.

Article Title: Explained: Why Cameron Green and other overseas stars can’t earn beyond Rs 18 crore at IPL Auction
Article Text:
Cameron Green (Photo by Pankaj Nangia/Getty Images)

IPL mini auction: Lot of interest for Cam Green | Wait ends for Prithvi Shaw, Sarfaraz Khan?

As the IPL 2026 mini auction gets underway on Tuesday, 16 December, attention is not just on the bidding battles but on a key rule that has quietly reshaped how overseas players are paid. While franchises may still drive prices higher inside the auction room, foreign cricketers will not take home the full amount once bidding crosses a fixed threshold.Under regulations enforced by the IPL governing council, overseas players can earn a maximum of INR 18 crore from the mini auction, regardless of how high franchises push the bidding. Even if a player attracts offers beyond that figure, his final salary will remain capped.The rule comes into focus as teams get ready to spend heavily. Kolkata Knight Riders enter the auction with the largest purse of INR 64.3 crore, while Chennai Super Kings have INR 43.6 crore. Despite the financial muscle on display, the new cap ensures that international stars will not receive inflated pay packets.The ceiling was introduced by the BCCI ahead of the IPL 2025 mega auction and has now been applied to mini auctions as well. It matches the highest retention slab from the previous mega auction, effectively keeping overseas salaries at a consistent maximum level.The move is aimed at enforcing financial discipline and preventing runaway inflation, a recurring trend in mini auctions driven by supply and demand gaps.In recent seasons, mini auctions have produced eye catching figures for overseas fast bowlers and all-rounders, often despite limited availability because of international schedules. Such deals triggered concerns around fairness, long term budgeting and the sustainability of franchise spending.Under the current framework, if an overseas player is bid up to INR 20 crore, he will still receive only INR 18 crore. The remaining INR 2 crore is transferred to the BCCI’s player welfare fund. Crucially, the franchise must still pay the full bid amount from its purse.The restriction applies only to overseas players. Indian cricketers remain exempt and will receive the full value of their winning bids, even if the amount exceeds INR 18 crore.
Article Summary: Ipl 2026 mini auction gets underway on tuesday, 16 december. Overseas players can earn a maximum of inr 18 crore from the mini auction. Even if a player attracts offers beyond that figure, his final salary will remain capped. The move is aimed at enforcing financial discipline and preventing runaway inflation.

Article Title: IPL 2026 Auction live streaming: Date, time, purse left, where to watch - All you need to know
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI/IPL

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

IPL mini auction: Lot of interest for Cam Green | Wait ends for Prithvi Shaw, Sarfaraz Khan?

IPL Auction 2026: Live streaming, when and where to watch



When is the

IPL 2026 auction

?

Where is the IPL 2026 auction being held?

What time does the IPL 2026 auction start?

Where can I watch the IPL 2026 auction on TV?

Where can I live stream the IPL 2026 auction?

How much money is available with each team for the IPL 2026 auction?

NEW DELHI: The 2026 Indian Premier League mini auction is set to kick off with 10 franchises vying for 77 player slots, operating under a combined spending cap of Rs 237.55 crore. The upcoming season is scheduled to begin in late March 2026.Kolkata Knight Riders enter the auction with the largest-ever purse in a mini auction, Rs 64.3 crore, positioning them as a dominant force in shaping bidding trends. Chennai Super Kings also hold a sizeable budget, giving them considerable influence in player selections.Australian all-rounder Cameron Green is widely expected to attract the highest bid, while players like Venkatesh Iyer, Liam Livingstone, and Ravi Bishnoi are also likely to command significant attention from franchises.With ample funds at their disposal, teams are anticipated to aggressively target uncapped and emerging talent, potentially sparking intense bidding wars for promising youngsters. Strategic acquisitions during this auction could prove pivotal for franchises aiming to strengthen their squads ahead of the new season.Beyond individual player signings, the mini auction will play a crucial role in shaping team compositions and balancing competition among franchises.Smart investments could give teams a decisive edge when the tournament gets underway in March.Overall, the 2026 IPL mini auction promises to be a high-stakes, closely watched event, with franchises leveraging their financial power to secure both star players and rising talent in preparation for a fiercely contested season.The IPL 2026 auction is scheduled for Tuesday, December 16.This year’s auction takes place in Abu Dhabi, UAE.The auction will begin at 2:30 PM IST.The live telecast will be available on Star Sports Network.Fans can stream the auction live on the JioHotstar app and website.Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) - Rs 64.3 crore (13 spots to fill)Chennai Super Kings (CSK) - Rs 43.4 crore (9 spots to fill)Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) - Rs 25.5 crore (10 spots to fill)Lucknow Super Giants (LSG) - Rs 22.95 crore (6 spots to fill)Delhi Capitals (DC) - Rs 21.8 crore (8 spots to fill)Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) - Rs 16.4 crore (8 spots to fill)Rajasthan Royals (RR) - Rs 16.05 crore (9 spots to fill)Gujarat Titans (GT) - Rs 12.9 crore (5 spots to fill)Punjab Kings (PBKS) - Rs 11.5 crore (4 spots to fill)Mumbai Indians (MI) - Rs 2.75 crore (5 spots to fill)
Article Summary: The 2026 indian premier league mini auction is set to kick off with 10 franchises vying for 77 player slots. Kolkata knight riders enter the auction with the largest-ever purse in a mini auction, rs 64.3 crore. Chennai super kings also hold a sizeable budget, giving them considerable influence in player selections.

Article Title: NHL Update: Connor McDavid reacts after Edmonton Oilers trade Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak
Article Text:
Stuart Skinner and Brett Kulak (Image Via Twitter)

How do Connor McDavid and Kris Knoblauch view Edmonton Oilers’ Goaltending trade?

Edmonton Oilers Trade Skinner + Kulak For Jarry + Poulin Thoughts | Quinn Hughes To Wild

On Saturday, the Edmonton Oilers' locker room was filled with a combination of feelings and expectations as the team prepared for a huge roster change before their game against the Toronto Maple Leafs. The exchange that sent goalie Stuart Skinner and defenseman Brett Kulak to the Pittsburgh Penguins was a drastic change for a team that had trusted both players during their long playoff runs. The names of Connor McDavid , Kris Knoblauch, Tristan Jarry, and Spencer Stastney were soon among the top talks of Edmonton, looking ahead to the future. The trade marked an emotional shift ahead of Edmonton's next chapter.The move was meant to tackle the goalkeeping issues, but the human aspect of the decision could not be overlooked. Skinner had been with the Oilers for parts of six seasons and had helped the team reach the Stanley Cup Finals twice in a row. Kulak was also a dependable player on the defense. After the morning skate, McDavid talked about how hard the moment was, and he made it clear that the loss of the familiar faces weighed on the team, even as they were getting ready for a new chapter.Connor McDavid called the trade a tough decision that the team had to make, and at the same time pointed to the positive side of the situation by saying how much the group would miss Skinner and Kulak.Head Coach Kris Knoblauch was equally supportive, stating that both players had been very dependable over the years, contributing not only on but also off the ice. Another ex-Oilers defenseman, Troy Stecher, who now plays for Toronto, offered his insight into the situation, too. He referred to the trade as part of the business and wished his ex-colleagues nothing but the best in their new home, Pittsburgh.The focus was then directed towards the newly recruited players. Knoblauch showed trust in Tristan Jarry and mentioned his experience and the good results he had in the past, despite a hard previous season. Jarry, who got the call against Toronto, shared that the last day and a half had been full of emotions but added that getting to play with superstars like McDavid and Leon Draisaitl was a thrill. At the same time, the rapid development of Spencer Stastney, who has been skating and moving the puck well, caught the coaching staff's attention, which believed that such a skill would bring the team more balance.The Oilers are taking change with a careful and optimistic attitude. The loss of reliable teammates is painful, but Edmonton is convinced that this kind of change will help the team to be better and thus to navigate through the season.Also Read: NHL Injury Update: Evgeni Malkin sidelined as Pittsburgh Penguins face playoff pressure
Article Summary: Edmonton oilers traded goalie stuart skinner and defenseman brett kulak to the pittsburgh penguins. Skinner had been with the oilers for parts of six seasons and had helped the team reach the stanley cup finals twice in a row. The move was meant to tackle the goalkeeping issues, but the human aspect of the decision could not be overlooked.

Article Title: Roger Federer and Mirka Federer vs Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló combined net worth: Tennis stars, money and life compared
Article Text:
Roger Federer and Mirka Federer vs Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló combined net worth: Tennis stars, money and life compared (Image Via Getty)

Roger Federer and Mirka Federer: Prize money, sponsors, and business income



Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló: Career earnings and steady growth

Roger Federer and Mirka Federer vs Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló: Combined net worth and lifestyle comparison

Roger Federer and Mirka Federer vs Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló: Recent updates and life after tennis

Roger Federer and Mirka Federer, and Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló, are two of the most famous couples in tennis history. Fans often compare their titles on court, but money and life after tennis also draw attention. Based on reports from Forbes, ATP Tour records, and official foundation websites, the Federer family still leads clearly in total wealth. Both couples live quiet lives, focus on family, and give back through charity.Roger Federer retired from tennis in September 2022 after the Laver Cup in London. During his career, Roger Federer earned about $130 million in prize money, according to ATP records. Most of his wealth comes from long-term sponsorship deals with Uniqlo, Rolex, and Wilson, along with business investments.Forbes and other trusted business outlets estimate Roger Federer’s net worth at around $550 million, making him one of the richest athletes in history, though not officially confirmed as a billionaire.Early stop from injury Mirka Federer, a former professional tennis player. She now supports Roger Federer's career and helps with family and humanitarian activities. They both run the Roger Federer Foundation, which focuses on educational projects in southern Africa and Switzerland.Having represented Spain in the Davis Cup Finals in Málaga, Rafael Nadal formally retired in November 2024. According ATP, he finished his career with 22 Grand Slam titles and amassed over $134 million in prize money.Forbes estimates Rafael Nadal's net worth at around $220 million based on sponsorships with Nike, Babolat, Kia, and his tennis academy.Working CEO of the Rafa Nadal Foundation, Mery Perelló—also known as Xisca Perelló.She has stayed mostly out of the spotlight while leading charity projects focused on children and education.When combined, Roger Federer and Mirka Federer are estimated at around $550 million, based on verified public estimates.Rafael Nadal and Mery Perelló together are estimated at around $220 million. While the gap is large, both couples avoid luxury displays and focus on long-term projects, family life, and privacy.In 2025, Roger Federer has stayed involved by way of corporate events, charitable activities, and public appearances. Most of recent media has focused on his post-retirement success.While Rafael Nadal has focused on founding his academy and enjoying time with family on the Balearic Island of Mallorca, the majority of media coverage regarding Nadal and his family since late 2024 and in the year 2025 has revolved around Nadal's retirement from professional tennis and Nadal's activities away from the professional tennis court.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka And Georgios Frangulis Vs Coco Gauff And Jalen Sera Combined Net Worth: Tennis Stars, Money, And More

Cristiano Ronaldo is the world's first footballer to reach billionaire status. Starting from 2022, Cristiano Ronaldo was still one of the biggest stars in football. He started the year at Manchester United. Later in the year, he left the club after his contract ended. At that time, trusted outlets like Forbes and Celebrity Net Worth estimated his net worth between $500 million and $600 million. Most of his money came from past salaries at Real Madrid and Juventus. He also earned a lot from sponsors like Nike and Herbalife. His move to Al Nassr in Saudi Arabia at the end of 2022 changed everything. The deal was worth close to $200 million per year, setting up a huge rise in his wealth.In 2023, Cristiano Ronaldo became the highest-paid athlete on the planet. Forbes listed his yearly earnings at more than $136 million. His Al Nassr salary made up a big part of this income. He also earned from his Nike lifetime deal and other brand partnerships.During this year, his total net worth was placed between $500 million and $650 million by several outlets. His CR7 brand also kept growing. This includes hotels, clothing, and gyms across different countries.By 2024, Cristiano Ronaldo was still leading the money charts. Forbes and The Sporting News estimated his yearly earnings between $260 million and $275 million. His Al Nassr deal continued to pay him massive wages.Off the pitch, his CR7 businesses brought in steady income. A mixed estimated net was there with worth around $500 million to $800 million by late 2024.In 2025, Cristiano Ronaldo reached a historic milestone. Bloomberg’s Billionaires Index reported his net worth at around $1.4 billion. This made him the first billionaire football player. His updated Al Nassr contract is reported to be worth about $225 million per year.This includes salary, bonuses, and image rights. His Nike lifetime deal also adds millions every year. When all income streams are counted, most business outlets agree he is now a billionaire.Cristiano Ronaldo earns most of his money from Al Nassr. Reports say his yearly pay is between $200 million and $225 million. He also earns from Nike, Herbalife, Clear, and his CR7 brand.In 2025, he continued to score goals for Al Nassr, showing he is still performing at a high level even at age 40. His success on the pitch and off the pitch keeps his value strong.Also Read: Cristiano Ronaldo Vs David Beckham: Comparing Net Worth, Legacy, And Global Influence

Article Title: Hockey’s first openly gay pro Brock McGillis explains why HBO’s Heated Rivalry hype could actually make NHL players less likely to come out
Article Text:
Heated Rivalry won’t create safer coming-out moments in the NHL, says Brock McGillis (Getty Images and HBO max)

Brock McGillis challenges Heated Rivalry impact on hockey coming out narrative



The debate around visibility in professional hockey has resurfaced, but this time it is driven by fiction colliding with lived reality. As LGBTQ+ stories gain space on major platforms, questions linger about whether representation alone can shift a deeply rooted sports culture. For some, progress feels close. For others, the gap between screen and locker room remains wide.Brock McGillis knows that gap better than most. As the first openly gay professional hockey player, he has spent years navigating conversations that often miss the harder truths. While HBO’s Heated Rivalry has drawn praise and attention, McGillis is clear that popularity does not always equal impact, especially inside a sport he says still struggles with normalized homophobia.McGillis pushed back strongly against claims that the series could encourage NHL players to come out. Speaking to PinkNews, he said he “wholeheartedly” disagrees with former NHL player Sean Avery’s belief that the show opens doors. “It’s probably more likely to have an adverse effect on a player coming out,” McGillis, 42, told the website. “And I hate to be negative because I really enjoy the show. But I also don’t believe that many hockey bros are going to watch it.And I don’t think, if they are watching it, they’re talking about it positively.”The series follows two fictional star players locked in a secret relationship for years. While the storyline has resonated with many viewers, McGillis argues that it risks oversimplifying what real players face. He points to his own experience after coming out in 2016, long after his semi-professional career ended. Despite extensive media coverage, he says the ripple effect never came. “Nobody’s like, ‘Oh, yeah. This came out and now I’m ready [to come out],’ ” McGillis told PinkNews. “It’s not happening.”For McGillis, the core issue is not a lack of stories but the culture surrounding the sport. He describes homophobia as something that “starts at a very young age and progresses,” reinforced daily through language and behavior. Watching Heated Rivalry even stirred personal memories. “Episode one gave me a panic attack,” he said, recalling years spent hiding a relationship. “I dated a guy for three years, not a soul in my life knowing. We had an alias for [me in his phone] in case [his friends] ever saw.”Still, McGillis does not dismiss the show entirely. He believes it could help people around players understand them better. “It might help the people around [players] understand a little more if they’re dating somebody; hopefully,” he said. And despite his criticism, he maintains faith in teammates themselves. “If a player did come out, hockey players would be the most likely to rally around their teammate more than any of the other big sports. ”For now, McGillis remains focused on advocacy, urging the sport to confront its realities head-on rather than leaning on fiction to do the work.Also Read: Sidney Crosby sounds alarm after Penguins blow multi-goal lead again, this time against Utah Mammoth
Article Summary: Brock mcgillis, the first openly gay professional hockey player, says hbo's heated rivalry won't create safer coming-out moments in the nhl. Mcgillis: "it’s probably more likely to have an adverse effect on a player coming out"

Article Title: “Never take it for granted” - JJ Redick issues bold statement backing LeBron James after Los Angeles Lakers edge Phoenix Suns
Article Text:
Image via getty

JJ Redick analyzes Los Angeles Lakers’ win over Phoenix Suns during the last minutes

JJ Redick PostGame Interview | Los Angeles Lakers vs Phoenix Suns

JJ Redick reflects on LeBron James and Dillon Brooks ’ on-court exchange

Also Read

The Los Angeles Lakers managed to rack up another win. It was a close one against the Phoenix Suns. Especially during the fourth quarter, when the Lakers were almost about to waste the 9-point lead they had racked up by the end of the third quarter. The Suns led the fourth quarter, racking up 37 points. However, LeBron James played a crucial role towards the end with his last-minute impressive free throws. Appreciating his effort, JJ Redick issued a bold statement during a post-game interview supporting the NBA legend.The Lakers coach, JJ Redick, appreciated the athlete and other members of the team who added to the team’s final standing. Players like Jarred Vanderbilt and Deandre Ayton each played a vital role in leading the Lakers to their victory. The coach acknowledged the teamwork and issued a supportive statement during the post-game interview. While he realizes that it was a tough and messy fight towards the end, the coach believes that such games reflect on the team’s on-court hard work. He particularly uses the word growth that is necessary among the players of the team.JJ Redick has always been appreciative of the team’s coordination and on-court hard-fought wins.The Los Angeles Lakers’ recent game against the Phoenix Suns was one such game. While the Lakers secured a 9-point lead towards the end of the 3rd quarter, they were on the verge of losing it all during the fourth quarter. The Suns added 37 points in that quarter, which brought down the lead gap between the two teams. LeBron James, however, with his last-minute free throws, managed to keep the lead intact and led the team to its victory.When asked about his opinion on the game, Redick admitted that the team did commit mistakes. However, the mistakes did not stop them from racking up the win. He appreciated players like Jarred Vanderbilt and Deandre Ayton for their continuous effort throughout the game. Despite the late struggle faced by the team, Redick continued to appreciate the team. He stated, “Winning ugly is actually really fun because it means you got in the trenches and fought. It’s about growth, not perfection.” Appreciating LeBron’s role in making the team win, the coach further added, “I never take it for granted. He puts his fingerprints on the game every night, and tonight was no different.”LeBron James got involved in a heated exchange with Dillon Brooks. It was during the Los Angeles Lakers and the Phoenix Suns game. During the third quarter, Dillon laid out an attack as LeBron stayed strong on defense. Even though Luka Doncic committed the foul, the play did not end. Dillon played the ball towards LeBron and it hit the NBA legend. LeBron got furious and it took the coach and other players to calm him down.When JJ was asked about this during the post-game interview, he stated, “Our group was unaffected by it.” Redick instead praised the legend for maintaining his cool and carrying out the game for the rest of the match. It seems like the legend’s age is not letting him stop his game and shall continue to do so for the rest of the season.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers managed to rack up another win against the phoenix suns. Lebron james played a crucial role towards the end with his last-minute impressive free throws. Lakers coach, jj redick, appreciated the athlete and other members of the team who added to the team’s final standing.
